text: @ochocinco Haven’t seen my Dad in a year, since he lives on the other side of the county. Was really hoping to fly out for his 55th birthday on July second but covid-19 isn’t letting that happen. Would love to be able to get him a gift instead, anything helps💜 $abbslit
